item.title: Indonesia-based Video Game Item Farming - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an individual based in Indonesia who can assist us in farming items in a video game. The task involves following instructions and playing the game to collect items. This is a remote job that can be done from the comfort of your own home. We will provide all the necessary instructions and guidelines to ensure successful item farming. If you enjoy playing video games and have a good understanding of game mechanics, this opportunity is for you.

Skills required:
- Proficient in playing video games
- Ability to follow instructions
- Attention to detail

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Entry

item.title: Editor de video (Youtube) - Upwork
item.description:
¡Hola a todos! Estoy buscando un editor nivel intermedio para videos tipo noticias relevantes en Latinoamérica más que todo en Perú. Es un canal en pleno crecimiento. Ya cuento con 2 editores pero necesito uno extra para momentos en que mas se necesita.

El trabajo consiste en:

- Yo te envío el audio de la narración y el guión para que tu realices la edición.
- Es CRÍTICO que sepas cómo mantener la retención de la audiencia. (Ganchos en los primero 4 minutos)
- Se espera que usted revise el guión y haga coincidir los clips con lo que se explica (debe estar libre de derechos de autor).
- Por el momento la duración de los videos sería de 10 minutos.

Se necesitaría un editor que realice 1 a 2 videos por semana.

Al ser un proyecto en crecimiento se está pagando 0,8$ por minuto.

Dejo algunas referencias para que vea el tipo de edición que se necesita:
https://youtu.be/6TGqvuPLOdk
https://youtu.be/8iN6fV4Q1BQ
https://youtu.be/Y9ajuB6Nbe0

¿A quién buscamos exactamente?
Alguien familiarizado con Premier pro.
Alguien con un toque constante en el contenido.
Alguien que sepa enganchar al público con videos del nicho de noticias.
Alguien con un portafolio de videos para ver su nivel de experiencia.
Alguien responsable con la entrega del video.

Budget: $8
Posted On: June 18, 2024 18:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Compositing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Compositing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Peru
click to apply

item.title: Part-Time Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Part-Time Editor

Job Summary:
We are currently seeking a part-time editor to join our dynamic team and assist in managing our workload for editing various types of content. As an editor, your primary responsibility will be to ensure that all content is error-free, consistent, and in adherence to our established style guide. This role will involve reviewing, selecting and editing content to create videos. We are looking for a detail-oriented candidate with strong grammar skills and a sharp eye for detail.

Common Editing Types -
Interviews
Weddings
Events
Corporate

An ideal applicant would have experience editing different forms of videos for different subjects.

Key Responsibilities:
- Review and edit content to ensure coherence, and adherence to our style guide
- Collaborate with videographer and other team members to maintain consistency in tone and style across all content
- Familiarize yourself with our specific style guides and formatting standards
- Manage your time effectively to meet deadlines and prioritize tasks efficiently
- Provide constructive feedback to writers to improve the overall quality of content

Required Skills:
- Proficiency in grammar, punctuation, and spelling
- Strong editing and proofreading abilities to identify and correct errors in content
- Familiarity with different style guides and ability to apply appropriate formatting standards
- Excellent time management and organizational skills to handle multiple projects simultaneously

Qualifications and Experience:
- Previous experience in editing or related field is preferred
- A keen attention to detail and a passion for maintaining high-quality content
- Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with a diverse team
- Excellent problem-solving abilities to address any content-related issues

This part-time position offers flexibility and is ideal for individuals seeking a work-life balance. If you possess a passion for editing and wish to contribute to our team, we encourage you to apply now and be a part of our exciting journey.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 17:51 UTC
Category: Copy Editing
Skills:Film Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Color Grading, Video Animation
Skills: Film Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Color Grading, Video Animation
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Review Videos for Content, log data per instructions - Upwork
item.description:
I have a currently undetermined number of videos from 10 minutes to an hour in length (currently 7 videos but will likely be 2 or 3 times that).

I need these to be manually reviewed by people that are fluent in English. There are a few things we are looking for in each video and when they are found, we woudl liek the video and timestamp logged along with a brief summary of the instance.

After the review and log is completed we will be looking for someone to cut the instances into a new single video , compiling all instances.

A few items that are very important for this project:
- Fluent English to understand what we are looking for and to be able to identify it in the videos
- Ability to start and coplete the project quickly once contract is awarded.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 17:49 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Communications, Computer Skills, Data Entry, English, Accuracy Verification, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing
Skills: Communications, Computer Skills, Data Entry, English, Accuracy Verification, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Reel Editor for Small Business - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented individual to quickly edit 1 Instagram reel for our small business. It is essential that the reel is engaging, visually appealing, and highlights our product in an enticing way. The editor will be responsible for selecting and arranging video clips, adding transitions and effects, incorporating appropriate music, and ensuring the final reel is of high quality. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and a good understanding of the Instagram platform. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work within a deadline are key.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Knowledge of Instagram platform
- Creativity
- Attention to detail

This is a small project with a 24-48 hour deadline.

DIRECTION:
-For inspiration our Instagram is @topdrawershop
-The video will start with our talent, Isaboko, first sketching design ideas with our sketchbook and pencil.
-Then, it will transition to the fashion show where the designs come to life and our vintage Polaroid camera was used.  
-Add Polaroid images throughout the reel.
-The track is listed below, but if you can include ASMR [sound effects] of the sketching, camera taking a snap shot, and the hustle and bustle of people at the fashion show that would be interesting (Gucci's IG reels do this a lot)
-Ideally the reel will be 45sec. - 1min.
-The feel is high-end, high-quality, creative.
-Song to be used: "adore u" by Fred Again

Please don't hesitate to ask questions. Thank you so much!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 18, 2024 17:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Video Post-Editing, Business
Skills: Graphic Design, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Video Post-Editing, Business
Country: Canada
click to apply

P.S: If you CURRENTLY work with successful YouTube football channels, it is an advantage!
Native UK/US voice is a plus.

This is a long term collaboration with good payment structure.

Looking forward to working with you,
Vio

item.title: Video Editor - YouTube | Tiktok | Shorts | Reels (only for Russian or Ukrainian speaking) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! I'm an Amazon seller and consultant based in Dubai. We produce expert short and long videos related to Amazon seller training, consultations, and product analytics. We are looking for a video editor for ongoing work on our video materials.

A sense of style is crucial for us. Each candidate will undergo a small test assignment to assess technical skills and creative approach.

Responsibilities:
• Edit 6-8 short videos per week (up to 2 minutes) for Shorts, Reels, and TikTok.
• Edit 1-2 long-form videos per week (from 10 to 30 minutes) for YouTube.
• Enhance video quality, color, and sound.
• Add introductory and concluding segments relevant to the video topic.
• Remove unnecessary pauses and errors to ensure smooth and professional content.

Requirements:
• Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar).
• At least 2 years of experience in video editing.
• Attention to detail and ability to maintain high-quality standards.
• Good communication skills and ability to follow instructions.
• Proficiency in Russian and English (B2+).

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with e-commerce or educational content.
• Creative mindset and ability to contribute ideas to improve videos.
• A strong sense of style.

Work Conditions:
• Fully remote work with a flexible schedule.
• Stable and reliable internet connection for uploading materials.
• Daily communication for discussing tasks and deadlines.

How to Apply:
If you are interested and meet the requirements, please submit your cover letter with the following:

• Your work experience.
• A link to your video portfolio for YouTube (talking head format) and a separate link for SM vertical videos.
• A brief description of your experience and why you think you are a good fit for this role.

Note:
We are specifically looking for candidates who are Russian or Ukrainian-speaking or from CIS countries.speaking

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 18, 2024 17:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, Elearning Video, Explainer Video, Promotional Video, Real Estate Video, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, Elearning Video, Explainer Video, Promotional Video, Real Estate Video, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Video Editing
Country: United Arab Emirates

item.title: Video Editor for Engaging Reels, YouTube Shorts, and TikTok Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create engaging reels, YouTube shorts, and TikTok videos in the style of Alex Hormozi's thumbnails. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of video editing techniques, storytelling, and social media trends. They should be able to take raw footage and transform it into captivating content that resonates with our target audience.

Skills needed:
- Video editing software proficiency (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Knowledge of various video formats and best practices for social media platforms
- Ability to create eye-catching thumbnails
- Strong grasp of storytelling and visual aesthetics
- Attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines

Additional info
- Working hours are flexible between 9am to 9pm EST because our team mostly works in that period.
- Use Slack for project communication
- Potential full time opportunity if skills are proven and demand catches up
- Branding and graphic design skill is a PLUS

This is an ongoing project with about 5 reels a week and 4 long form video editing a month.
We are open to both intermediate-level and advanced-level video editors who have a portfolio showcasing their past work.

If you have a great eye for detail, a passion for social media, and can create engaging videos, we want to hear from you!

Please include a link to your portfolio when applying, or else your application won't be considered.
Thanks!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 17:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply
